Package controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The controller class contains the code which sends information from the GUI to the model. All data must move through this class in order to execute. Functions written here are meant to get data, run it through backend algorithms, and return them back to view.
    Version:
    v1.0, 10/31/2019
    Author:
    Mike mspadaro@student.sjcny.edu
    See Also:
    Java sourceCode

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • runCPUFCFS

        public void runCPUFCFS()
        Pulls all burst time data from GUI, first performing a check for empty values and incorrect inputs such as letters or symbols. Runs burst times through FCFS class. Then returns calculated values as well as generated arrival times to the view. Gantt chart is then created based off the data returned.

      • runCPUSJF

        public void runCPUSJF()
        Pulls all burst time data from GUI, first performing a check for empty values and incorrect inputs such as letters or symbols. Runs burst times through SJF class. Then returns calculated values as well as generated arrival times to the view. Gantt chart is then created based off the data returned.

      • runCPUPriority

        public void runCPUPriority()
        Pulls all burst time data from GUI, first performing a check for empty values and incorrect inputs such as letters or symbols. Runs burst times through Priority class. Then returns calculated values as well as generated arrival times to the view. Gantt chart is then created based off the data returned.

      • selectScheduler

        public void selectScheduler()
        Selects the scheduler and modifies the action of the calculate button.

      • selectProcesses

        public void selectProcesses()
        Selects the number of processes and disables unneeded fields.

      • randomBurstTimes

        public void randomBurstTimes()
        calls static method to generate random burst times from FCFS.

      • failInputs

        public boolean failInputs()
        Checks for failed inputs either "", capital or lower case letters as well as symbols.

        void
